column3: Feels strange to not see the type in here, no?\n
We never use `unsigned` without type in the code anywhere else, let's just make this `unsigned int`.\n
`coins->nHeight` is an int, `nMempoolHeight` is an unsigned int. Any specific reason for introducing a `signed long` here?\n
COINBASE_MATURITY is a [signed]  int, and we are subtracting.\n
I see 5 other cases in the code, but fine with me.\n
